definition: surname Long/short for 吉隆坡[Ji2 long2 po1], Kuala Lumpur

sentences.english: Even if not to stay, so grand luxury Memorial also to be a trip.
sentences.chinese: 即使留不住，如此隆重奢華的祭奠也算不虛此行吧。

sentences.english: Cameron held a grand welcome ceremony for Wen prior to the talks.
sentences.chinese: 會談前，卡梅倫爲溫家寶舉行了隆重的歡迎儀式。

sentences.english: Today, a grand opening ceremony is held in Nantong Zhanyang Fiber Co.
sentences.chinese: 今天，南通展陽纖維有限公司隆重舉行開業典禮。

sentences.english: Today, the faculty of Fuyong Middle School will hold the 40th anniversary celebration.
sentences.chinese: 今天，福永中學將隆重舉行建校40週年慶祝活動。

sentences.english: The inauguration ceremony for the new Hengqin Port Joint Inspection Complex Building was ceremoniously held on the morning of December 8th.
sentences.chinese: 橫琴口岸新聯檢大樓落成典禮8日上午隆重舉行。

sentences.english: 2005 september , d . phone ' s 12th anniversary celebration held in beijing.
sentences.chinese: 2005年9月迪信通十二週年慶典在北京隆重舉行。

sentences.english: You have to edit it quickly for a blog entry, a presentation or your grand-ma, who learned to send emails.
sentences.chinese: 隆重介紹你要編輯的博客條目，很快發送電子郵件。

sentences.english: Gilani held a grand welcome ceremony for Wen at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 吉拉尼在機場爲溫家寶舉行了隆重的歡迎儀式。

sentences.english: Today was the grand opening and Karla and Melanie were lost .
sentences.chinese: 今天才剛隆重開幕，卡拉和梅拉妮也在裏面迷路了。

sentences.english: Lynk and Zelda had an grand presence at the booth.
sentences.chinese: 林克和塞爾達有一個在展臺隆重的存在。

sentences.english: President Kirchner held a grand welcoming ceremony for President Hu upon his visit.
sentences.chinese: 基什內爾在這裏爲胡錦濤來訪舉行隆重的歡迎儀式。

sentences.english: Recently, the cloud and county toys wisdom Park opening ceremony was held.
sentences.chinese: 日前，雲和縣玩具智慧園開業儀式被隆重舉行。

sentences.english: We held a grand celebration of the 60th anniversary of the founding of New China.
sentences.chinese: 我們隆重慶祝新中國成立60週年。

sentences.english: Our family celebrated my grandparents' golden wedding anniversary in a big way last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期日，我家隆重慶祝了我祖父母的金婚紀念日。

sentences.english: They try to make these activities ceremonious and lively.
sentences.chinese: 從家庭到家族，都儘量把這些活動搞得隆重而熱鬧。

sentences.english: A grand foundation stone laying ceremony for Asian Packaging Center Edifice was held yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 亞包大廈奠基儀式昨在錢江新城隆重舉行。

definition: ostentation/a show of extravagance/grand style/red tape
